PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_TrackElementTypeDerailer
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition to all occurrences and types of IfcTrackElement with PredefinedType set to DERAILER.

PropertyDef.Name: AppliedLineLoad
PropertyDef.Definition: The load of line where the derailer is installed. It is a design parameter and is defined by mass per length.

PropertyDef.Name: DerailmentMaximumSpeedLimit
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the maximum allowable train speed for the derailer.

PropertyDef.Name: DerailmentWheelDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the wheel diameter requirement for the derailer.

PropertyDef.Name: DerailmentHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: Height of derailment block when derailer in protection state.
